name: carousel
content:
carousel noun [C]
(AMUSEMENT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
mainly US (UK usually merry-go-round) a large machine at a fair that turnsround and has wooden or plastic animals or vehicles on which children ride

carousel noun [C]
(AIRPORT)
a continuous moving strip on which passengers' bags are put for collection in an airport
Spaces Images/Blend Images/GettyImages
